original_title: All The Stage Is A World
overview: Every year in Virginia Beach, the theater departments from eleven different schools go head up in a one act play competition of their own choosing, whether it be an adaptation of a well known work or a creation all their own. We follow a few of these theater departments as they prepare for the big competition, revealing what itâ€™s like to deal with the stress of theater production, while having to go through teenage high school crap at the same time.
tagline: And all the players merely men and women
title: All The Stage Is A World
